code: @Override public RestChannelConsumer prepareRequest(RestRequest request, NodeClient client) throws IOException {     String id = request.param("id").     DeleteStoredScriptRequest deleteStoredScriptRequest = new DeleteStoredScriptRequest(id).     deleteStoredScriptRequest.timeout(request.paramAsTime("timeout", deleteStoredScriptRequest.timeout())).     deleteStoredScriptRequest.masterNodeTimeout(request.paramAsTime("master_timeout", deleteStoredScriptRequest.masterNodeTimeout())).     return channel -> client.admin().cluster().deleteStoredScript(deleteStoredScriptRequest, new RestToXContentListener<>(channel)). }
